div.p: Monmouth-Roseville C.U.S.D. #238 located in West Central Illinois serves 1,600 students. We have 5 schools Lincoln Early Childhood, Harding Primary, Central Intermediate, Junior High & the High School. Our mission is to "Empower students to take the next step."
